医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Autobio自动化工作流程系统AutoLas X-1荣获2023年iF设计奖全球工业设计最高奖项——2023年iF设计奖正式揭晓。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Autobios-automated-workflow-system-AutoLas-X-1-has-won-the-2023-iF-design-award.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Autobios-automated-workflow-system-AutoLas-X-1-has-won-the-2023-iF-design-award.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ae97602-c0f0-4fd9-b354-c4f9337df6c0 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 06:05:00 -0400 Autobio's automated workflow system, AutoLas X-1, has won the 2023 iF design award
Cerba Healthcare 将收购加拿大合同研究实验室 Cirion Biopharma Research，以扩大生物分析能力并缩短部署复杂临床试验的时间全球领先的医疗诊断公司 Cerba HealthCare 今天宣布收购 CIRION BIOPHARMA RESEARCH INC https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Cerba-Healthcare-to-acquire-Canadian-contract-research-laboratory-Cirion-Biopharma-Research-to-expand-bioanalytical-capability-and-shorten-部署复杂临床试验的时间.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Cerba-Healthcare-to-acquire-Canadian-contract-research-laboratory-Cirion-Biopharma-Research-to-expand-bioanalytical-capability-and-shorten-部署复杂临床试验的时间.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64090d47-49d4-45b4-8890-27132f2aec31 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 06:03:00 -0400 Cerba Healthcare to acquire Canadian contract research laboratory Cirion Biopharma Research to expand bioanalytical capabilities and shorten time-to-deploy complex clinical trials
大麻合法化和商业化是否会导致更多交通事故？大麻合法化对加拿大安大略省交通伤害的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Does-legalizing-and-commercialising-cannabis-cause-more-road-accidents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Does-legalizing-and-commercialising-cannabis-cause-more-road-accidents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2fdf819-7b41-4a0e-8010-363d2c2ad0a2 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 04:08:00 -0400 Does legalizing and commercialising cannabis cause more road accidents?
Autobio Autof MS系列获得欧盟IVDR C级注册证书Autobio Autof MS系列已获得欧盟IVDR C级注册证书。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Autobios-Autof-MS-Series-has-obtained-the-EU-IVDR-Class-C-registration-certificate.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Autobios-Autof-MS-Series-has-obtained-the-EU-IVDR-Class-C-registration-certificate.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=edebf15d-0859-45fc-91fb-f69e312eed30 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 03:13:00 -0400 Autobio's Autof MS Series has obtained the EU IVDR Class C registration certificate
揭开我们身体抵御链球菌性咽喉炎等第一道防线的秘密研究人员绘制了分泌性免疫球蛋白 A (sIgA) 与人类 CD89 和化脓性链球菌 M4 相互作用的复杂结构图，为我们第一道粘膜防御线的运作方式提供了新的见解。该研究揭示了这些成分可能相互影响的复杂方式，影响细菌的生存策略和宿主的免疫反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230910/Unlocking-the-secrets-of-our-bodys-first-line-of-defense-against-strep-throat-and-more.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230910/Unlocking-the-secrets-of-our-bodys-first-line-of-defense-against-strep-throat-and-more.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0374508e-257a-49ce-9503-b53d62bcab03 Sun, 10 Sep 2023 23:51:00 -0400 Unlocking the secrets of our body's first line of defense against strep throat and more
CDC 就对抗 RSV 的新工具向医疗保健提供者提供建议CDC 预测，在即将到来的冬季，呼吸道合胞病毒 (RSV) 的活动将会增加，敦促临床医生为弱势群体实施新的预防工具，如 nirsevimab 和 FDA 批准的疫苗。该建议发布之际，RSV 活动呈现出不断变化的模式，影响婴儿、儿童和成人，每年导致数千人住院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230910/CDC-advises-healthcare-providers-on-new-tools-to-combat-RSV.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230910/CDC-advises-healthcare-providers-on-new-tools-to-combat-RSV.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49d16615-ab7c-4daa-adfb-a31a260292f8 Sun, 10 Sep 2023 23:45:00 -0400 CDC advises healthcare providers on new tools to combat RSV
揭开致命胰腺癌的秘密驱动因素：新目标为治疗带来希望研究人员发现了一种超级增强子调节的RNA结合蛋白级联，它可以驱动胰腺导管腺癌（一种致命的胰腺癌）的生长。这一发现为靶向治疗提供了一条有希望的新途径，有可能避免与其他治疗相关的严重副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230910/Unlocking-the-secret-drivers-of-deadly-pancreatic-cancer-New-target-offers-hope-for-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230910/Unlocking-the-secret-drivers-of-deadly-pancreatic-cancer-New-target-offers-hope-for-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29b9f687-6701-492f-8fbf-5f826cc3ca26 Sun, 10 Sep 2023 23:38:00 -0400 Unlocking the secret drivers of deadly pancreatic cancer: New target offers hope for treatment
中国即食食品中发现危险的抗生素耐药细菌研究显示，中国 25 个省份的即食食品中存在高水平的耐抗生素金黄色葡萄球菌 (MRSA)，构成严重的公共卫生风险。研究结果强调需要采取更强有力的食品安全措施，因为已鉴定的 MRSA 菌株对多种抗生素具有耐药性，并表现出多种毒力因子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230910/Dangerous-antibiotic-pressive-bacteria-found-in-Chinas-ready-to-eat-foods.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230910/Dangerous-antibiotic-pressive-bacteria-found-in-Chinas-ready-to-eat-foods.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9949db44-624e-4ab2-84bf-17c1236ddc46 Sun, 10 Sep 2023 23:23:00 -0400 Dangerous antibiotic-resistant bacteria found in China's ready-to-eat foods
地中海饮食增强皮肤治疗，消除青少年特应性皮炎研究报告称，一名患有特应性皮炎的 14 岁男孩在将单克隆抗体治疗与地中海饮食相结合后，症状完全消失。该案例研究强调了饮食在控制炎症性皮肤病中的作用，表明将饮食改变与药物治疗相结合以改善结果的治疗潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230910/Mediterranean-diet-supercharges-skin-treatment-clears-up-atopic-dermatitis-in-teen.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230910/Mediterranean-diet-supercharges-skin-treatment-clears-up-atopic-dermatitis-in-teen.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e6a5fda-34c5-4471-87ba-ce4335efe0f3 Sun, 10 Sep 2023 23:10:00 -0400 Mediterranean diet supercharges skin treatment, clears up atopic dermatitis in teen
英国研究显示，疫苗接种可增强抗体反应并降低新冠病毒严重程度英国研究表明，无论涉及何种病毒变种，COVID-19 疫苗接种均可有效提高抗 S 抗体水平并减轻感染后症状的严重程度。高抗体水平与更快的病毒清除有关，表明传播风险降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230910/Vaccination-amps-up-antibody-response-and-cuts-down-COVID-severity-UK-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230910/Vaccination-amps-up-antibody-response-and-cuts-down-COVID-severity-UK-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da148fc6-4402-4320-bd34-bf5af694abd5 Sun, 10 Sep 2023 22:51:00 -0400 Vaccination amps up antibody response and cuts down COVID severity, UK study shows
